name: Edith and Her Shadow
description:
*This is a student project, as much time as we could afford went into this, and we would have loved more time to do drastically more, but that is not the case. So this is our final result after weeks of effort. Enjoy.*

Edith and her Shadow is a story about a young adult leaving her home town to face her emotions, battle her mental illnesses, and realize that the world doesn't have to be such a bad place. She meets up with an old friend who convinces her of these things. And takes in the scenery along the way.
